answers.answer: If semen comes into contact with your vagina, the pregnancy is possible.I'd maybe consult a doctor - if you haven't already - for your husband's erectile issues.

seems to be more of psychological issues. Is it performance anxiety for him or some other emotional issues? If he can masturbate then there is no issues. Best is talk it over .... failing which see a sexpert.

question: My husband can get hard and precum if I'm jacking him or ******** but it gets soft going to my vagina so I force his soft penis in me hoping to get pregnant can I still get pregnant? We also use a pump can I get preganant that way?
title: Can I still get pregnant?
